Text: RE EIN Ben Erwin Enron Broadband Services office mobile Forwarded by Ben ErwinEnron Communications on AM Michael nronXgate PM To Bradford BrooksEnron nron Communications cc Ben ErwinEnron nron Communications Subject RE EIN He might I am having trouble rounding up an engineer on MSN theyre all busy imagine that Ill see if I can get something before the day is out In the meantime heres the current EIN topology with some extra info you can ignore If you are going to reproduce this drawing PLEASE remove the OSPF costs and circuit ids Youll need Visio to open this doc Thanks Original Message From Brooks Bradford Sent Thursday July PM To Lam Michael Cc Erwin Ben Subject RE EIN MSN architecture buildout will be a key Does McCartney have this Bradford Brooks Digital Content Services Enron Broadband Services Phone US Mobile US Email Michael nronXgate AM To Ben ErwinEnron nron Communications cc Bradford BrooksEnron nron Communications Subject RE EIN Ben The best place to start is some documents and detailed illustrations of the EIN Give me a little time to gather this stuff for you not that we have a whole lot documented Ill also gather what I can on the upcoming MSN network build out as this appears to be a vital component of future product deployments Ill be out of the office this upcoming week but upon my return I can have followup discussions with you to address questions and provide more detail I can also to arrange for you to sit with some of the primary architects of the EIN and go into as much detail as you can stomach Thanks Original Message From Erwin Ben Sent Wednesday July PM To Lam Michael Cc Brooks Bradford Subject EIN Michael I enjoyed meeting you yesterday and appreciated the time I dont know what your schedule is the next few days but I need to learn more about our network I need to be an expert on what we have today what we are building for tomorrow and what we need for games We walked through a high level but I would love the chance to get to the details Any ideas on the best way to do this I am not trying to throw this on you well I guess I actually am but I figure you and Brad are the best people to ask for this I am not afraid of earlylate meetings or just reading through some presentations I look forward to your response Ben Bradany ideas on how to get more comfortable with the network and be the resource Michael needs me to be Ben Erwin Enron Broadband Services office mobile
